mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name=#{name}, price=#{price}, img=#{img}, stock=#{stock} WHERE itemid=#{itemid}
mapper.select: SELECT itemid, cateid, name, price, img, itemdate, stock, detail_img FROM item WHERE cateid = #{cateid}

SELECT SUM(oi.cnt), it.itemid, it.name, it.img, oi.cnt, it.price, (SUM(oi.cnt) * it.price) AS total FROM item it INNER JOIN orderinfo oi ON it.itemid = oi.itemid GROUP BY it.itemid, oi.cnt ORDER BY SUM(oi.cnt) DESC LIMIT 3
